root.name: Jet Car Stunts
root.description: OverviewJet Car Stunts challenges the player to drive a jet-propelled race car through tracks featuring jumps, corkscrews, and loops.The player tilts the device to steer, and uses on-screen buttons to manage the jet, brakes, and air-flaps, and acceleration.The game features levels of varying difficulty, from beginner to impossible.There are two types of levels: one type called platforming is more about conserving jet and making it through the tracks with as few mistakes as possible.The other, called Time Trials, is all about speed, and features tracks that are more circular and built for long periods of acceleration.UpdatesTrue Axis has released several major updates for Jet Car Stunts. One update added support for DLC level packs. Two level packs have been released so far, one paid, and one free.There have been updates for iOS 4.0 multi-tasking, as well as updates for iPhone 4 Retina displays. The developer is currently working on how to switch from OpenFeint to Apple's Game Center.
